name: catch.pdf
label: catch
cap: Pollock catch estimates (t) from the Eastern Bering Sea by season and region. The A-season is defined as from Jan-May and B-season from June-October.

name: catch_sex.pdf
label: catch_sex
cap: Estimate of EBS pollock catch numbers by sex for the A season (January-May) and B seasons (June-October) and total.

name: catch_distn_a.png
label: catch_distn_a
cap: EBS pollock catch distribution during A-season, 2021--2023. Column height is proportional to total catch.

name: fsh_cpue.png
label: fsh_cpue
cap: A-season (top) and B-season (bottom) EBS fleet-wide cumulative catch by hours observed fishing and relative pollock catch per hour of fishing (by sector
Alt: middle). Data were recorded by NMFS scientific observers.

name: catchp.png
label: prop_a_season
cap: Proportion of the annual EBS pollock TAC by month during the A-season, 2000--2023. The higher value observed since 2017 was due to Amendment 110 of the FMP to allow greater flexibility to avoid Chinook salmon.

name: catch_distn_b.png
label: catch_distn_b
cap: EBS pollock catch distribution during B-season, 2021--2023. Column height is proportional to total catch. Note that directed fishery for pollock generally is finished prior to October; the labels are indicative full-year catches.

name: cpue_bseason.png
label: bseas_cpue
cap: B-season EBS fleet-wide nominal pollock catch (kg) per hour of fishing recorded by NMFS scientific observers.

name: roe.pdf
label: roe
cap: EBS pollock roe production in A and B seasons, 2000-2023.

name: fleet_dispersal.png
label: fleet_dispersal
cap: Estimated mean daily distance between operations, 2000-2023.

name: catage.png
label: catage
cap: EBS pollock fishery estimated catch-at-age data (in number) for 1992--2022. Age 10 represents pollock age 10 and older. The 2012 year-class is shaded in orange.

name: bts_biom.pdf
label: bts_biom
cap: Bottom-trawl survey biomass estimates with error bars representing 95% confidence intervals for the VAST model-based methods for EBS pollock.

name: bts_temp.pdf
label: bts_temp
cap: Bottom and surface temperatures for the Bering Sea from the NMFS summer bottom-trawl surveys (1982--2019, 2021-2023). Dashed lines represent mean values.

name: bts_temp_cpue.pdf
label: bts_temp_cpue
cap: EBS pollock CPUE (shades = relative kg/hectare) and bottom temperature isotherms in degrees C; from the bottom trawl survey data 2011--2019 and 2021.

name: bts_3d.png
label: bts_3d
cap: Bottom trawl survey pollock catch in kg per hectare for 2021-2023. Height of vertical lines are proportional to station-specific pollock densities by weight (kg per hectare) with constant scales for all years (red stars indicate tows where pollock were absent from the catch).

name: bts_age_comp.png
label: bts_age
cap: Pollock abundance levels by age and year as estimated directly from the NMFS bottom-trawl surveys (1990--2019,2021-2023). The 2012 and 2018 year-classes are shaded differently.

name: avo_map_yr.pdf
label: data_avomap
cap: Maps of acoustic vessel-of-opportunity (AVO) index data 2006-2023. Grid cell size and shading is proportional to pollock backscatter.

name: vastage.png
label: vastage
cap: Pollock abundance levels by age and year as estimated directly from the NMFS bottom-trawl surveys (1990--2019

name: ats_usv.png
label: ats_usv
cap: Geographic dipiction of backscatter intensity as measured from USVs in 2020.

name: ats_vast.png
label: ats_vast
cap: VAST model predicted log-density of pollock abundance based on acoustic backscatter from NMFS acoustic-trawl surveys (1994--2018) and from the 2020 USV transects.

name: fsh_wtage_comb.pdf
label: fsh_wtage_comb
cap: Recent fishery average weight-at-age anomaly (relative to the mean) by strata for ages 3--10, 2017--2021. Vertical shape reflects uncertainty in the data (wider shapes being more precise), colors are consistent with cohorts.

name: fsh_wtage_strata
label: fsh_wtage_strata
cap: Fishery average weight-at-age anomaly (relative to the mean) across strata and combined for all ages (3--10), and available years (1991--2022). Vertical shape reflects uncertainty in the data (wider shapes being more precise), colors are consistent with cohorts.

label: fsh_wtage_strata_yr
cap: Recent fishery average weight-at-age anomaly (relative to the mean) by strata for ages 3--10, 2018--2022. Vertical shape reflects uncertainty in the data (wider shapes being more precise), colors are consistent with cohorts.

label: fsh_lw_month
cap: EBS pollock fishery body mass (given length) anomaly (standardized by overall mean body mass at each length) by month based on some over 700 thousand fish measurements from 1991--2023.

label: fsh_lw_anom_str_yr_box
cap: EBS pollock fishery body mass (given length) anomaly (standardized by overall mean body mass at each length) by year and season/area strata, 1991--2023. Strata are defined as A-season (top), and B-season west of 170W (middle) and east of 170W (bottom)

name: fsh_lw_anom_yr_box.pdf
label: fsh_lw_anom_yr_box
cap: EBS pollock body mass (given length) anomaly (standardized by overall mean body mass at each length) by year, 1991--2023.

label: fsh_lw_str_yr_mean
cap: EBS pollock body mass (given length) anomaly (standardized by overall mean body mass at each length) by year and season/area strata shown as mean values with a fitted loess smooth trend, 1991--2021, and the fishery (bottom) for EBS pollock.

name: vastage_vs_db.pdf
label: bts_vast_age
cap: Comparison of EBS pollock estimated proportions-at-age from the bottom trawl surveys using the standard design-based estimates and those using the VAST spatio-temporal model, 1982-2023 (no data from 2020).

name: cole2.png
label: cole2
cap: Estimated availability (i.e., fraction of pollock available to a survey gear type) for three select years (rows) for the bottom (BT) and acoustic (AT) trawl surveys (columns) from the combined base case model.

name: mod_data.pdf
label: mod_data
cap: Model runs comparing last year's assessment with the impact of sequentially adding new data (first 2023 catch and 2021 fishery catch-at-age, then the 2023 bottom trawl survey data point, then the acoustic-trawl and finally the AVO data.

name: mod_ats_eval1.pdf
label: mod_ats_eval1
cap: Model fits to different treatment and assumptions about index CPUE for the ATS time series where VAST CV20% and DB CV20% mean that the CVs for the index values between 1994 and 2023 each average 20% for the design-based and VAST treatments, respectively. The other cases use the sampling error and variance estimates arising from the methods.

name: mod_ats_eval2.pdf
label: mod_ats_eval2
cap: Pollock spawning biomass estimates sensitivity to assumptions about index CPUE for the ATS time series where VAST CV20% and DB CV20% mean that the CVs for the index values between 1994 and 2018 each average 20% for the design-based and VAST treatments, respectively.  The other cases use the sampling error and variance estimates arising from the methods.

label: mod_bts_biom
cap: EBS pollock model fit to the BTS survey data (VAST estimates based on density dependence-corrected CPUE by station), 1982--2019, 2021-2023. Units are relative biomass.

name: fsh_lw_str_yr_box.pdf
label: mod_ats_biom
cap: EBS pollock model fit to the ATS biomass index, 1994--2022.

name: xxx
label: mod_mean_age
cap: EBS pollock model fits to observed mean age for the Acoustic trawl survey (top), the bottom trawl survey (middle) and fishery (bottom)

name: fsh_lw_str_yr_mean.pdf
label: mod_fsh_sel
cap: Selectivity at age estimates for the EBS pollock fishery; note that the values for the terminal year is used for ABC and OFL projections.

name: layer1.png
label: mod_fsh_age
cap: Model fit (dots) to the EBS pollock fishery proportion-at-age data (columns; 1992--2022). The 2022 data are new to this year's assessment. Colors coincide with cohorts progressing through time.

name: layer2.png
label: mod_cpue_fit
cap: EBS pollock model fits to the Japanese fishery CPUE.

name: mod_data.pdf
label: mod_avo_fit
cap: Model results of predicted and observed AVO index. Error bars represent assumed 95\% confidence bounds of the input series.

label: mod_bts_sel
cap: Model estimates of bottom-trawl survey selectivity, 1982--2023.

label: mod_bts_age
cap: Model fit (dots) to the bottom trawl survey proportion-at-age composition data (columns) for EBS pollock. Colors correspond to cohorts over time.

name: mod_ats_sel.pdf
label: mod_ats_sel
cap: Estimates of AT survey numbers selectivity-at-age (with mean value equal to 1.0) over time for EBS pollock age 2 and older.

label: mod_ats_age
cap: Model fit (dots) to the acoustic-trawl survey proportion-at-age composition data (columns) for EBS pollock. Colors correspond to cohorts over time (for years with consecutive surveys).

name: mod_cpue_fit.pdf
label: mod_ser
cap: Estimated spawning exploitation rate (defined as the percent removal of egg production in a given spawning year).

name: mod_avo_fit.pdf
label: mod_F
cap: Estimated instantaneous age-specific fishing mortality rates for EBS pollock.

label: mod_hist
cap: Comparison of the current assessment results with past assessments of begin-year EBS age-3+ pollock biomass.

name: mod_ats_biom.pdf
label: mod_phase
cap: Estimated spawning biomass relative to annually estimated $F_{MSY}$ values and fishing mortality rates for EBS pollock. Two projection years are shaded in yellow.

name: mod_mean_age.pdf
label: mod_rec
cap: Recruitment estimates (age-1 recruits) for EBS pollock for all years since 1964 (1963--2022 year classes) for Model 20. Error bars reflect 90\% credible intervals based on model estimates of uncertainty.

name: mod_fsh_sel.pdf
label: mod_srr
cap: Stock-recruitment estimates (shaded represents structural uncertainty) and age-1 EBS pollock estimates labeled by year-classes.

name: mod_fsh_age.pdf
label: mod_rs
cap: EBS pollock productivity as measured by logged recruits per spawning biomass, log(R\/S), as a function of spawning biomass with a linear fit (bottom) and over time, 1964--2023 (top).

label: age_diversity
cap: For the mature component of the EBS pollock stock, time series of estimated average age and diversity of ages (using the Shannon-Wiener H statistic), 1980–2023.

name: mod_bts_age.pdf
label: mod_retro
cap: Retrospective patterns for EBS pollock spawning biomass showing the point estimates relative to the terminal year (top panel) and approximate confidence bounds on absolute scale (+2 standard deviations).

label: tier3_proj
cap: Projected EBS Tier 3 pollock yield (top) and female spawning biomass (bottom) relative to the long-term expected values under $F_{35\%}$ and $F_{40\%}$ (horizontal lines).  $B_{40\%}$  is computed from average recruitment from 1978--2020. Future harvest rates follow the guidelines specified under Tier 3 Scenario 1.

label: tier3_proj_alt3
cap: Projected pollock yield (top) and female spawning biomass (bottom) under Alternative 3---*_fishing under the recent 5-year average fishing mortality_*.  The long-term expected values under $F_{35\%}$ and $F_{40\%}$ (horizontal lines) $B_{40\%}$  are computed from average recruitment from 1978--2020.

name: mcmc_pairs.pdf
label: mcmc_pairs
cap: Pairwise plot of selected EBS pollock parameters and output from MCMC 12 thousand draws were saved as an approximation to the multivariate posterior distribution. Note that the figures on the diagonal represent the marginal posterior distributions. Key: steepness and lnR0 are stock-recruitment parameters, DynB0 is the ratio of spawning biomass estimated for in 2023 over the value estimated that would occur if there had been no fishing, B2024 is the spawning biomass in 2024 and Fmsyr is the rate at which MSY would be achieved on average.

name: mcmc_marg.pdf
label: mcmc_marg
cap: Integrated marginal posterior density (based on MCMC results) for the 2024 EBS pollock female spawning biomass compared to the point estimate (grey line).

label: vast_idx
cap: Pollock index values for the standard survey region, the NBS, and combined based on the VAST application to density-dependent corrected CPUE values from the BTS data, 1982--2019, 2021-2023.

label: vast_idx
cap: Pollock index values for the standard survey region, the NBS, and combined based on the VAST application to density-dependent corrected CPUE values from the BTS data, 1982--2019, 2021-2023.

label: N_comp
cap: Numbers-at-age estimates for 2019 (top) and 2022 (bottom) cmpared to the mean values since 1991.

label: cum_N_wt
cap: Numbers-at-age multiplied by weights-at-age estimates for 2022 (top) and accumulated (bottom).

label: sa_quantiles
cap: VAST diagnostics for the AT models using simulation residuals based on the DHARMa package.

name: at_sa_density.pdf
label: at_sa_density
cap: Predicted log-backscatter (arbitrary units) from the VAST model fitted to the AT data, where the 2020 data are from the USV.

label: q_sens
cap: Results of effective BTS survey catchability/availability for different levels of constraints on time-varying selectivity parameters, together with the estimate from the COLE model.

label: q_sens_ssb
cap: The estimated spawning stock biomass for different constraints on time-varying selectivity parameters.

label: proj_ssb
cap: The estimated EBS pollock spawning stock biomass for model 20 last year and this with projections equal to the estimated fishing mortality from 2023.

name: at_transect_spacing.png
label: at_transect_spacing
cap: An evaluation of the impact on historical pollock ATS biomass estimates if alternate transects were dropped (and uncertainty increases as depicted by vertical error bars) compared to the actual (full) number of survey transects.

name: fsh_psc_cpue.png
label: fsh_psc_cpue
cap: Nominal catch divided by effort (hours towed) for some bycatch species and pollock for the EBS pollock fleet (sectors combined) 2000-2023.

name: mod_srr_sq_a.pdf
label: mod_srr_sq_a
cap: Stock-recruitment estimates (shaded represents uncertainty in SRR) and age-1 EBS pollock estimates labeled by year-classes for Model 20.0 and with the influence of the 1978 year-class removed.

name: mod_srr_a_b.pdf
label: mod_srr_a_b
cap: Stock-recruitment estimates (shaded represents uncertainty in SRR) and age-1 EBS pollock estimates labeled by year-classes comparing a result with a diffuse prior on SRR steepness.

name: mod_srr_sq_c_d.pdf
label: mod_srr_sq_c_d
cap: Stock-recruitment estimates (shaded represents uncertainty in SRR) and age-1 EBS pollock estimates labeled by year-classes comparing implied SRR under models conditioned that FMSY equals different SPR rates.

label: rv_usv_biom
cap: Predicted annual sum of pollock backscatter (RV+USV backscatter as analyzed from the VAST application) compared to the design-based biomass estimates (RV+USV biomass), 1994-2022.

label: fsh_wt_freq
cap: Pollock fishery data showing the frequency of mean pollock weight within a tow (in 50 g increments) by year and season.

label: fsh_wt_freq_week
cap: Pollock fishery data showing the frequency of mean pollock weight within a tow (in 50 g increments) by recent years and weeks of the B-season.

name: at_age.png
label: at_age
cap: Acoustic-trawl survey pollock numbers-at-age estimates, 1991-2022. Note that the series used in the model starts in 1994.

label: at_pollock_in_sa
cap: Pollock dominate the catch in historical midwater AT surveys (top panel) and during the summer pollock fishery (bottom panel) in the EBS.  Jellyfish, which are very weak acoustic scatterers compared to fishes with a swimbladder have been excluded from the  survey catch summaries.

label: at_sa_biom
cap: Acoustic backscatter in historical acoustic-trawl surveys compared with the biomass resulting from the survey.  Both indicies have been normalized to have a mean of 1 over the period 1994-2018 so that they can be directly compared.

label: at_sa_biom_regress
cap: Scatterplots of total backscatter and pollock biomass for acoustic-trawl surveys from 1994-2018.  Results for >3m above the seafloor are shown in the left panel and results for the 0.5 to 3m above the seafloor are shown in the right panel.

label: at_usv_biom
cap: Time series of observed biomass (i.e. ‘survey biomass’) and biomass estimated by dropping all trawl data in that year and predicting survey biomass based on trawl sampling in the other years of the time series (‘converted biomass’).  In 2020, no trawling was conducted, and the biomass estimate was predicted based on the average relationships established in previous years (see previous figure).  The average discrepancy  between the predicted and converted biomass is 5.4% (range 0.1 to 11%).

label: at_biom
cap: Acoustic-trawl survey pollock biomass time series.  Error bars correspond to the relative estimation error (i.e. CV) estimated with a 1-D geostatistical technique. The 2020 survey was conducted with USVs, and has larger errors associated with the estimate that incorporate the effects of  reduced sampling effort (i.e. 40 nmi spaced transects rather than 20 nmi transects), and the method used to convert backscatter to biomass conversion.

label: at_sa_map
cap: Map of backscatter measurements during the 2020 USV acoustic survey.  The size and color of each point represents the mean acoustic backscatter attributed to pollock in a 0.5 nmi transect segment.

label: at_sa_prop
cap: Proportion of pollock backscatter above and below 3m above bottom observed in acoustic-trawl surveys.

name: fsh_lenfreq.pdf
label: fsh_lenfreq
cap: Fishery catch-at-length (cm) by the pollock fishery, 1992-2023.

name: bts_lenfreq.pdf
label: bts_lenfreq
cap: Pollock abundance levels by size and year as estimated from the NMFS bottom-trawl surveys (1990--2019 and 2021--2023).

name: fsh_cohort_locales_0818.pdf
label: fsh_cohort_locales
cap: Pollock age sample mean locales for two cohorts representing the 2008 and 2018 year-classes (from data through 2022).

name: genetics.png
label: genetics
cap: Principal Component Analysis of walleye pollock genetics. The color of each point indicates the sampling.

name: mod_regimes.pdf
label: mod_regimes
cap: Mean recruitment estimates (age-1) for EBS pollock for different periods with error bars representing 95\% credible intervals.

name: mcmc_marg_fmsy.pdf
label: mcmc_marg_fmsy
cap: Integrated marginal posterior density (based on MCMC results) for the $F_{MSY}$ for EBS pollock and different central tendency values.

name: fish_wtage_data_pred.pdf
label: fish_wtage_data_pred
cap: Data input and model predictions for the weight-at-age random-effects model fit separately to obtain variance estimates for cohort and year effect contributions to changes in incremental growth from one age to the next. Shadings reflect the anomaly from the mean while the numbers are the weight-at-age in kg.

name: retro_sel.pdf
label: retro_sel
cap: Retrospective pattern for estimated EBS pollock fishery selectivity (dots) compared to the projected selectivity from the year prior (solid line).

name: retro_sel_mnage.pdf
label: retro_sel_mnage
cap: Retrospective pattern for the mean selected age (ages 1-8) based on estimated EBS pollock fishery selectivity compared to the projected selectivity from the year prior.

name: mod_21_agecomp.pdf
label: mod_21_agecomp
cap: Model results showing the impact of new data available in 2023 overall for EBS pollock; recruitment (top) and spawning biomass (bottom).

name: fmsy_sel.pdf
label: fmsy_sel
cap: Comparison of $F_{MSY}$ and mean selected age. The horizontal axis is a way to summarize if selectivity tends towards younger or older fish. Labels indicate the year that demographic parameters (weight-at-age, selectivity-at-age) were used to compute $F_{MSY}$.

name: acoustic_ppl.png
label: acoustic_ppl
cap: Plot of the observed index values (solid line) for the AVO (top) and ATS (bottom), the distribution of the expected value (yellow dots) and the posterior predictive distribution (grey points).

name: wtage_bts.pdf
label: btswtage_comparison
cap: Panels showing the values for mean pollock weight-at-age used in the previous assessment (left panel) and the values revised for this assessment as based on more data and appropriate CPUE weighting (right panel). the shadings indicate anomalies over time within ages (columns).

name: post_profile.pdf
label: post_profile
cap: Distribution depicting the uncertainty of the 2018 year-class (bottom) and the scatter of posterior likelihood values (with the mean negative log-likelihood subtracted off).

name: ssb_v_2018.pdf
label: ssb_v_2018
cap: Plot of a representation of the posterior marginal distributions of spawning biomass in 2023 (vertical scale and right-side distribution) versus the size of the 2018 year-class (horizontal scale and the top distribution).

name: mod_retroR.pdf
label: mod_retroR
cap: Retrospective patterns for EBS pollock recruitment showing the point estimates relative to the terminal year (top panel) and approximate confidence bounds on absolute scale (+2 standard deviations).

name: MLE_v_post.png
label: MLE_v_post
cap: Comparison of the asymptotic parameter standard errors (from inverting the Hessian; vertical axis) with the marginals from the MCMC draws (horizontal axis).

name: AVO_Series_change.png
label: avo
cap: "Time series of EBS pollock data from the acoustic vessels of opportunity (AVO) showing the years of new data compared to previous series and the full series."

name: cog.png
label: cog
cap: The EBS pollock stock center of gravity as estimated over time using VAST

name: retro_cohort_termyr.pdf
label: retrocohtyr
cap: Retrospective evolution of EBS pollock selected year-class estimates as a function of the terminal year of data used in the model (based on retrospectives of Model 23.0).

name: retro_cohort.pdf
label: retrocoh
cap: Retrospective evolution of EBS pollock selected year-class estimates as a function of the the number of years the year-class has been in the model (based on retrospectives of Model 23.0).
